entry.title: Tokyu Ruby Kaigi
entry.summary:
On May 29, I attended the 10th annual Tokyu Ruby Kaigi held at Shibuya,Tokyo. I made a lightning talk about a Xoxzo telephony gem (gem is the ruby packaging system). This gem is the first public gem I wrote in my life. I also enjoyed a lot of exciting talks, laughs and of course fantastic food and excellent beer.

[gallery ids="1451,1452" type="rectangular"]

This is the second time I joined this conference and hopefully want to come back next year!
